org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation
[Groovy] Class PushOp

java.lang.Object
  org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation.PushOp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable
class PushOp

Push changes to a remote repository.

Push changes on the current branch. Fail if it wouldn't be a fast-forward.

 grgit.push()
 grgit.push(all: false)

Push changes on all branches. Fail if it wouldn't be a fast-forward.

 grgit.push(all: true)

Push tags to the remote.

 grgit.push(tags: true)

Push changes on the current branch, even if it's not a fast-forward.

 grgit.push(force: true)
See git-push Manual Page.
See Also:
Since:
0.1.0

Property Summary
boolean all

true to push all branches, false (the default) to only push the current one.
boolean force

true if branches should be pushed even if they aren't a fast-forward, false (the default) if it should fail.
java.util.List refsOrSpecs

The refs or refspecs to use when pushing.

java.lang.String remote

The remote to push to.

boolean tags

true to push tags, false (the default) otherwise.
 
Constructor Summary
PushOp(Repository repo)

Property Detail

all

boolean all
true to push all branches, false (the default) to only push the current one.

force

boolean force
true if branches should be pushed even if they aren't a fast-forward, false (the default) if it should fail.

refsOrSpecs

java.util.List refsOrSpecs
The refs or refspecs to use when pushing. If null and all is false only push the current branch.

remote

java.lang.String remote
The remote to push to. Defaults to origin.

tags

boolean tags
true to push tags, false (the default) otherwise.
